metadata.title: Which wellness aesthetic are you?
metadata.provenance_note: Paraphrased structure from a Cosmo-adjacent quiz; wording adapted for benchmarking.

preface: From ice baths to reformer Pilates to matcha walks, which wellness vibe is most you? Answer these five and tally your letters.

format.display_instructions: Choose one option per question. Your dominant letter determines your result.

options.label: A
options.text: 7 a.m. Pilates, iced coffee/matcha, canal-side stroll.

options.label: B
options.text: DIY green juice and a quick journal session at the beach.

options.label: C
options.text: Sunrise hike with friends; giant thermos of tea.

options.label: D
options.text: Cold plunge, red-light, protein smoothie—tracked on your watch.

options.label: A
options.text: Pilates, beach day, then reality TV catch-up.

options.label: B
options.text: Farmers’ market haul and skincare restock.

options.label: C
options.text: Desert camping and a starry-night grill.

options.label: D
options.text: Breathwork workshop followed by deep-tissue massage.

options.label: A
options.text: Reformer Pilates in a matching set.

options.label: B
options.text: Beach power-walk with a podcast.

options.label: C
options.text: Long outdoor ride/laps; main-character energy.

options.label: D
options.text: Strength training, then sauna; metrics or it didn’t happen.

options.label: A
options.text: That new activewear drop.

options.label: B
options.text: Gua sha and an ice roller.

options.label: C
options.text: Bedazzled jumbo water bottle.

options.label: D
options.text: Massage gun and collagen restock.

options.label: A
options.text: An “everything” shower plus a hair-mask ritual.

options.label: B
options.text: Rating viral açai spots on IG.

options.label: C
options.text: Taking 100 sunset pics, posting one.

options.label: D
options.text: Red-light face mask while binging a show at home.

scoring.rules: Determine the letter you chose most frequently.

outcomes.label: Pilates Princess
outcomes.description: Graceful, social, and schedule-savvy. Studio classes and cute sets are your love language.

outcomes.label: Green Juice Goddess
outcomes.description: Wellness is a ritual. You live for farmers’ markets, routines, and glowy skincare.

outcomes.label: Hot Girl Hiker
outcomes.description: Outdoor endorphins > everything. Spontaneous plans and golden-hour selfies abound.

outcomes.label: Biohacking Babe
outcomes.description: Optimization is your sport. You’re on a first-name basis with your recovery metrics.

scoring.ties: If tied, pick the description that best matches your lifestyle or split the crown.
